content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_siaddemows2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_siaddemows2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raw@siaddemows2.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Dim_Cust (
	[CustomerKey] int,
	[WWICustomerID] int,
	[Customer] nvarchar(4000),
	[BillToCustomer] nvarchar(4000),
	[Category] nvarchar(4000),
	[BuyingGroup] nvarchar(4000),
	[PrimaryContact] nvarchar(4000),
	[PostalCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[ValidFrom] datetime2(7),
	[ValidTo] datetime2(7),
	[LineageKey] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Dimension/Customer/Dimension.Customer.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_siaddemows2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Dim_Cust
GO
